has_sum_exp_series:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `Â«expr áµáµ’áµ–Â» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprtsze -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprtsze -/

/-- If `exp R x.fst` converges to `e` then `exp R x` converges to `inl e + inr (e â€¢ x.snd)`. -/
theorem has_sum_exp_series [Field ğ•œ] [CharZero ğ•œ] [CommRing R] [AddCommGroup M] [Algebra ğ•œ R] [Module R M]
    [Module (Â«expr áµáµ’áµ–Â» R) M] [IsCentralScalar R M] [Module ğ•œ M] [IsScalarTower ğ•œ R M] [TopologicalRing R]
    [TopologicalAddGroup M] [ContinuousSMul R M] (x : (exprtsze) R M) {e : R}
    (h : HasSum (fun n => exp_series ğ•œ R n fun _ => x.fst) e) :
    HasSum (fun n => exp_series ğ•œ ((exprtsze) R M) n fun _ => x) (inl e + inr (Â«expr â€¢ Â» e x.snd)) :=
  by
  simp_rw [exp_series_apply_eq] at *
  conv =>
    congr
    ext
    rw [â† inl_fst_add_inr_snd_eq (x ^ _), fst_pow, snd_pow, smul_add, â† inr_smul, â† inl_smul, nsmul_eq_smul_cast ğ•œ n,
      smul_smul, inv_mul_eq_div, â† inv_div, â† smul_assoc]
  refine' (has_sum_inl M h).add (has_sum_inr M _)
  apply HasSum.smul_const
  rw [â† hasSum_nat_add_iff' 1]; swap; infer_instance
  rw [Finset.range_one, Finset.sum_singleton, Nat.cast_zero, div_zero, inv_zero, zero_smul, sub_zero]
  simp_rw [â† nat.succ_eq_add_one, nat.pred_succ, Nat.factorial_succ, Nat.cast_mul, â† nat.succ_eq_add_one,
    mul_div_cancel_left _ ((@Nat.cast_ne_zero ğ•œ _ _ _).mpr <| nat.succ_ne_zero _)]
  exact h
#align has_sum_exp_series has_sum_exp_series

exp_def:

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `Â«expr â€¢ Â» -/
theorem exp_def (x : (exprtsze) R M) : exp ğ•œ x = inl (exp ğ•œ x.fst) + inr (Â«expr â€¢ Â» (exp ğ•œ x.fst) x.snd) :=

theorem eq_smul_exp_of_ne_zero (x : (exprtsze) R M) (hx : x.fst â‰  0) :
